name: Xylxn: The Gate of Color
description:
At the center of our world, stands the Spectral Fountain.
The color trickles down the marble, providing our planet with color.
One day... The color has been bleached, corrupting our world.

Guide Xylxn, Wynwa, Ynaye and Zwiri through various puzzles to restore the Spectral Fountain and restore color to the world!

This game was originally made for the 2020 Global Game Jam. This game is being continued as a passion project.
